biography.content:
Yiming Tang received his Ph.D. degree from School of Computer and Information, Hefei University of Technology in 2011. He is now an Associate Professor, Master Tutor in Hefei University of Technology, and his research interests include  fuzzy control, fuzzy system,  clustering, image processing, affective computing, and computer-aided design. He is now a visiting professor at University of Alberta, Canada.

He has published more than 50 papers in many journals and conferences (including International Journal of Approximate Reasoning, International Journal of Information Technology & Decision Making, Computers and Mathematics with Applications, Iranian Journal of Fuzzy Systems, Journal of Systems Engineering and Electronics, Applied Mathematics and Information Sciences, Chinese Journal of Electronics, IEEE International Conference on Fuzzy Systems, International Conference on Quantitative Logic and Soft Computing, International Conference on Computer Supported Cooperative Work in Design, and so forth). 

He is an Associate Editor of Journal of Mathematics and Informatics, and also a senior member of CAAI (Chinese Association for Artificial Intelligence) and a member of IEEE, CCF (China Computer Federation). 

He is the Chairperson of the Organizing Committee: 2015 Symposium of Fuzzy Logic and Intelligent Computing. He serves as a Professional Committee of Multiple-Valued and Fuzzy Logic of China Computer Federation, a Professional Committee of Rough Sets and Soft Computing of Chinese Association for Artificial Intelligence, a Professional Committee of Cooperative Computing of China Computer Federation, a Professional Corresponding Committee of Machine Learning of Chinese Association for Artificial Intelligence.

He serves as a reviewer of several international journals (including IEEE Transactions on Fuzzy Systems, Information Sciences, International Journal of fuzzy Systems, International Journal of Electrical Power and Energy Systems, ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing, Signal Processing, International Journal of Fuzzy Systems and so on) and conferences.

keyword.content: Clustering, Fuzzy system,  Affective computing, and Image processing
